column5: is he open still? Does he have minnows?where aelse in the area could I get some minnows?
yep!  he's still open and almost always has minnows.  they are pretty pricey!!
Yes hes still open....FisherMike is right very pricey l got some there to do alittle icefishing this winter wow and he counts them out to..lol
anywhere else to get minnows in the London/St.Thomas area?
No not that l know of sorry.....if you do find one let me know cause l want to get some to do alittle crappie fishing...
sorry l forgot about Port Bruce theres a bait shop there. l know its not in the area. hope that helps you.

the only other place in or around london is archies.  im pretty sure its called archies anyway, it around hamilton rd and adelaide.  however, the place is extremely unreliable.  the guy opens and closes at completely random times.  i stopped going there years ago, but last  time i was there he did sell minnows.  definitely call ahead.

I don't think Archie is there anymore. It was called stop and Go bait. I think he has started to run it out of house again over off Thompson Road area. I can't remember the street name but I know where it is.
Archie's (519) 432-0880 - 152 Emerson Avenue, London  He's still there.
